summary: A young man poses as "the Whip King" and collects the reward for a bandit he has seen killed by a famous bounty hunter. He must now learn Kung Fu if he is to live up to this new persona and conquer the enemies he has inherited.
cast: Jackie Chan|Chun-Erh Lung|Cheng-Lan Chin|Chih-Ping Chiang|Kang Chin|Kang Ho|Ti Hsieh|Hang Hsu|Yuan Hsu|Han-Chang Hu|Sae Ok Kim|Chi-Lun Li|Hai Lung Li|Min-Lang Li|Wen-Tai Li|Chao-Hsiung Lin|Kuang Yung Lin|Shun-Keng Lu|Ju-Lung Ma|Tien Miao|Szu-Cheng Mu|Kang Peng|Dean Shek|James Tien|Yao Wang|Wu Ma|Te-Shan Wu|Lieh Yang|Bang Yu
keywords: kung fu|showdown|wing chun|kung fu master|fighting style
title: El aprendiz de Kung Fu
